Hi — Avelar Here.

I'm a Designer on the Growth and Product team at Pitzi.com.br

Recently, I worked on launching the smartphones protection called Moto Proteção, in partnership between Pitzi and the amazing Motorola Brazil team. I worked from design to development the insurance app and web applications.

Before that. I worked with our team on research and design a Third-Part cell phone insurance web application for some of biggest insurance companies on Brazil.

And before that, I worked on the Pitzi Ninja, a bussiness game app that helps 2k+ insurance sellers achieve their goals.

If you want some details about my work, you can e-mail me.
